entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Mildred Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:24 PM MST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 32. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 32. Wind chill minus 39 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 01:49 AM MST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 26.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 26. Wind chill minus 42 in the morning and minus 36 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 01:49 AM MST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 35.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 35. Wind chill minus 38 in the evening and minus 43 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 01:49 AM MST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Sunny. High minus 22.
entry.summary: Sunny. High minus 22. Forecast issued 01:49 AM MST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Clear. Low minus 36.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 36. Forecast issued 01:49 AM MST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Sunny. High minus 23.
entry.summary: Sunny. High minus 23. Forecast issued 01:49 AM MST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Clear. Low minus 33.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 33. Forecast issued 01:49 AM MST Tuesday 21 February 2023
